name: chicagotribune
text: From furloughs and layoffs to some media companies closing for good, economic fallout from COVID-19 has idled hundreds of local journalists — at a time Chicagoans are relying on local TV, radio and newspapers for information about the pandemic https://t.co/qSvsc5sSpm

name: chicagotribune
text: The US Border Patrol is using pandemic powers to waive asylum rights and immediately expel immigrants. https://t.co/dHWYpgwNce

text: President Trump plays politics with Chicago crime, a game only criminals win, writes columnist @cptime. https://t.co/z1bkXejgTt

text: The Big Ten should cancel its football season and acknowledge the dismal realities of life in a pandemic, writes columnist @SteveChapman13. https://t.co/eCXGnwedye
